favorites.title: Camp Alec
favorites.description: A heartwarming comedy about misfit campers at an unconventional summer program where they discover friendship, self-confidence, and unexpected talents. When quirky activities spiral into chaos, the campers learn to embrace their differences and support each other no matter what.

favorites.title: The Royal Hotel
favorites.description: Two backpackers take jobs at a remote Australian outback pub with strange locals and unsettling secrets. As their nights unravel into paranoia, they fight to uncover the hotel's sinister truth.

favorites.title: The Accountant
favorites.description: A forensic accountant with autism uncovers financial discrepancies linking a powerful criminal organization to government officials. As he digs deeper, he must rely on his lethal combat training to survive the corruption he unearths.

favorites.title: Chinatown
favorites.description: A detective uncovers corruption in 1930s Los Angeles.

favorites.title: A Haunted House
cast: Marlon Wayans, Marlene Forte, Essence Atkins
favorites.description: Malcolm and his girlfriend Kisha as they move into their dream home, only to discover itâ€™s haunted by a demon that possesses Kisha, prompting Malcolm to recruit a team of paranormal experts to exorcise her.
